client

        raw_force

This program implement a client that receives a md5 hash and try to break it if it succeed it will send back the password otherwise it will send "nope"

Consts

BRUTE_FORCE_LEN = 5
length of generated password 
CHARSET = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789"
charset to use to generate password

Procs

proc checkMD5(password, hash: string): bool {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
do the md5sum of password and compare to hash 
proc crack(hash: string; wordlist: seq[string]): string {.
    ...raises: [Exception, ValueError], tags: [RootEffect], forbids: [].}

try to crack the hash using wordlist first

if it didnt succeed, try raw brute force generating password using CHARSET of length BRUTE_FORCE_LEN

proc handle(server: Socket; wordlist: seq[string]) {....raises: [LibraryError,
    Exception, OSError, SslError, TimeoutError, ValueError],
    tags: [RootEffect, ReadIOEffect, TimeEffect, WriteIOEffect], forbids: [].}
get the hash from the server and try to break it send the password if found or "nope" 
proc raw_force(str: var string; hash: string; str_pos: uint): string {.
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
recursive function that generates password of length BRUTE_FORCE_LEN using CHARSET and for each generated password of the correct length check if the md5sum match hash
